mapper.insert: insert into own_users (user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_birthday, user_gender, user_perm) values ( #{userId}, #{userPasswd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userBirthday}, #{userGender}, '일반회원')
mapper.select: SELECT s.sns_nickname sns_nickname FROM sns_account s, own_users o WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND s.sns_account_no = o.sns_account_no
